name: Sage Blessed Cow Saint Amalgamate
description:
"Dare to Stare at the Soul's Eye of Creation"

"Come closer to the art so I can see the whites of your eyes. Come closer to the art and dare to touch its Soul. Feel our warmth and watch us glow; or dive in and enjoy the show. Come closer to the art so I can see the glow in your eyes - and you may find - the art is looking back at you; weighing the karma of your Soul."

Part of the "Saint Amalgamation" collection - this is the first of 3, and honoring The Rule of Three, editions there'll be three.
